thread.title: Khloe Kardashian Leaves Lamar Odom's Bedside for Sister Kim's Baby Shower
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian Leaves Lamar Odom's Bedside for Sister Kim's Baby Shower

title: Khloe Kardashian Leaves Lamar Odom's Bedside for Sister Kim's Baby Shower
text:
Khloe Kardashian Leaves Lamar Odom's Bedside for Sister Kim's Baby Shower Posted just a moment ago 
Timothy White/E! (LOS ANGELES) -- Khloé Kardashian left her estranged husband Lamar Odom's bedside for the first time since he was found unconscious and unresponsive at a Las Vegas brothel to help her sisters celebrate Kim Kardashian West's baby shower on Sunday. 
Khloé joined sisters Kim and Kourtney and stepsisters Kendall and Kylie Jenner for a Troop Beverly Hills -themed shower. The girls all wore matching striped pajamas and camped out inside mini tents. 
"Sister Sunday," Khloé posted on Instagram , along with a picture of the girls all huddled together. 
Kylie posted a similar photo captioned, "Baby shower vibes." 
In another photo , Kourtney and Kylie channel the Wilderness Girls from the 1989 film with Louis Vuitton suitcases, lanterns, Girl Scout cookies and chilled champagne. "just our usual morning routine #troopbeverlyhills #sipstea," she writes. 
Less than two hours later, Khloé left and returned to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, where Odom's currently receiving treatment, according to People magazine. 
Kim is expecting her second child with husband Kanye West. The magazine reports she initially postponed the baby shower to fly to Nevada to be with Khloé while she supported Odom during his initial days of treatment at the Las Vegas Sunrise Hospital.
